title: BRIEF-Amazon Says GameOn Brings Cross-Platform Competitions To Developers And Players With New Cloud-Based Service
text: March 19, 2018 / 1:18 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Amazon Says GameOn Brings Cross-Platform Competitions To Developers And Players With New Cloud-Based Service Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Amazon.Com Inc: * AMAZON GAMEON BRINGS CROSS-PLATFORM COMPETITIONS TO DEVELOPERS AND PLAYERS WITH NEW CLOUD-BASED SERVICE * AMAZON.COM INC - ANNOUNCED AMAZON GAMEON, A CROSS-PLATFORM, COMPETITIVE GAMING SERVICE FOR DEVELOPERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
